summary: A comprehensive Django test suite that sets up site and cache configurations, defines lightweight models, and validates sitemap generation and handling across generic views, HTTP/HTTPS responses, caching, empty outputs, priority and last‑modified values, ordering, multilingual indexing, robots.txt directives, and management utilities for pinging Google.
business_intent: Ensure the application's sitemap implementation functions correctly in all scenarios to support SEO, proper search‑engine indexing, and reliable delivery over both HTTP and HTTPS.
